Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI can directly tell me the implementation process or answer, and the teacher will only tell me what I should learn, but not directly tell me how to do it.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Generally speaking, GenAI's response is more comfortable because it was created to serve humanity and can patiently answer my questions. But teachers cannot spend a lot of time tutoring one student
